import React from "react" import { Card, CardBody } from "reactstrap" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './tour-card.css' const TourCard = ({ tour }) => { const { id, city, title, photo, price, featured, avgRating, reviews } = tour return
Featured
{city} {avgRating}{""} ({reviews.length})
{title}
${price}/per person
} export default TourCard;
